meanings.definition: A dish consisting of water chestnuts and chicken livers wrapped in bacon and marinated in soy sauce.
meanings.sent1: At the party, the guests enjoyed the delicious rumaki.
meanings.sent2: The rumaki was a hit at the gathering.
meanings.sent3: The rumaki looked like little flavor-packed bundles of joy.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the sizzling rumaki filled the room.
meanings.sent5: I couldn't resist the temptation of the savory rumaki.

meanings.definition: A type of appetizer typically served at parties or gatherings.
meanings.sent1: Everyone loved the rumaki at the event.
meanings.sent2: The hostess prepared a platter of delicious rumaki.
meanings.sent3: The rumaki disappeared from the table in seconds.
meanings.sent4: The rumaki added a touch of elegance to the occasion.
meanings.sent5: The crunchy texture of the rumaki delighted the guests.
